tasks.label: Android: Start AVD Medium
args: $roots = @($env:ANDROID_SDK_ROOT, $env:ANDROID_HOME, (Join-Path $env:LOCALAPPDATA 'Android\Sdk')) | Where-Object { $_ -and (Test-Path $_) } | Select-Object -Unique; if (-not $roots) { throw 'No se encontro Android SDK. Define ANDROID_SDK_ROOT o ANDROID_HOME.' }; $emu = $null; foreach ($root in $roots) { $candidate = Join-Path $root 'emulator\emulator.exe'; if (Test-Path $candidate) { $emu = $candidate; break } }; if (-not $emu) { throw 'No se encontro emulator.exe en el Android SDK detectado.' }; Start-Process -FilePath $emu -ArgumentList '-avd "Medium_Phone_API_36.1"' -WindowStyle Normal
